articles.author: Malay Mail
articles.title: Blinken cuts short Asia trip after Covid-19 case among travelling group while in Malaysia - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR Dec 15 — US Secretary of State Antony Blinken cut short his South-east Asia visit today due to a Covid-19 case in his travelling party, an official said, in an abrupt halt to a trip aimed at boosting ties in a region where China’s influence has g…
articles.content:
US Secretary of State Antony Antony Blinken will end his trip prematurely after a confirmed case of Covid-19 in his entourage. Picture by Olivier Douliery/Pool via Reuters

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: New species of bacteria named after Singapore - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): An unexpected discovery by a team of doctors analysing skin and wound samples has led to a new species of bacteria being identified and named after Singapore.
